chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
m: nat
n: nat

Goal:
~ divides (ps n) (qs m)

Premises:
ps = {| str := fun n : nat => nthprime (2 * n); str_inj := fun (n m : nat) (H : nthprime (2 * n) = nthprime (2 * m)) => let H0 : 2 * n = 2 * m := nthprime_inj (2 * n) (2 * m) H in (fun lemma : n = m <-> BinInt.Z.of_nat n = BinInt.Z.of_nat m => Morphisms.iff_flip_impl_subrelation (n = m) (BinInt.Z.of_nat n = BinInt.Z.of_nat m) lemma) (ZifyClasses.mkrel nat BinNums.Z eq BinInt.Z.of_nat eq (fun x y : nat => iff_sym (Znat.Nat2Z.inj_iff x y)) n (BinInt.Z.of_nat n) eq_refl m (BinInt.Z.of_nat m) eq_refl) (let H1 : BinInt.Z.mul (BinNums.Zpos (BinNums.xO BinNums.xH)) (BinInt.Z.of_nat n) = BinInt
qs = {| str := fun n : nat => nthprime (1 + 2 * n); str_inj := fun (n m : nat) (H : nthprime (1 + 2 * n) = nthprime (1 + 2 * m)) => let H0 : 1 + 2 * n = 1 + 2 * m := nthprime_inj (1 + 2 * n) (1 + 2 * m) H in (fun lemma : n = m <-> BinInt.Z.of_nat n = BinInt.Z.of_nat m => Morphisms.iff_flip_impl_subrelation (n = m) (BinInt.Z.of_nat n = BinInt.Z.of_nat m) lemma) (ZifyClasses.mkrel nat BinNums.Z eq BinInt.Z.of_nat eq (fun x y : nat => iff_sym (Znat.Nat2Z.inj_iff x y)) n (BinInt.Z.of_nat n) eq_refl m (BinInt.Z.of_nat m) eq_refl) (let H1 : BinInt.Z.add (BinNums.Zpos BinNum
divides = fun n k : nat => exists p : nat, k = p * n : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments divides (_ _)%nat_scope
primestream_divides : forall (ps : primestream) (n m : nat), divides (ps n) (ps m) -> n = m
divides_bool_spec' : forall n p : nat, divides_bool (S n) p = false < -> ~ divides (S n) p
prime_algo : forall p : nat, prime p < -> p = 2 \/ 3 <= p /\ ~ divides 2 p /\ (forall n : nat, 3 + 2 * n < p -> ~ divides (3 + 2 * n) p)
Znat.Nat2Z.inj_add : forall n m : nat, BinInt.Z.of_nat (n + m) = BinInt.Z.add (BinInt.Z.of_nat n) (BinInt.Z.of_nat m)
Znat.Nat2Z.inj_mul : forall n m : nat, BinInt.Z.of_nat (n * m) = BinInt.Z.mul (BinInt.Z.of_nat n) (BinInt.Z.of_nat m)
Nat.compare_antisym : forall n m : nat, (m ?= n) = CompOpp (n ?= m)
Znat.Nat2Z.inj_lt : forall n m : nat, n < m < -> BinInt.Z.lt (BinInt.Z.of_nat n) (BinInt.Z.of_nat m)
Znat.Nat2Z.inj_le : forall n m : nat, n <= m < -> BinInt.Z.le (BinInt.Z.of_nat n) (BinInt.Z.of_nat m)
Znat.Nat2Z.inj_sub_max : forall n m : nat, BinInt.Z.of_nat (n - m) = BinInt.Z.max BinNums.Z0 (BinInt.Z.sub (BinInt.Z.of_nat n) (BinInt.Z.of_nat m))
power_factor_uniq : forall p i j x y : nat, p <> 0 -> ~ divides p x -> ~ divides p y -> p ^ i * x = p ^ j * y -> i = j /\ x = y
ZifyClasses.not_morph : forall s1 t1 : Prop, s1 < -> t1 -> ~ s1 < -> ~ t1
divides_bool_spec : forall n p : nat, divides_bool (S n) p = true < -> divides (S n) p
divides_fact : forall m p : nat, 1 < p <= m -> divides p (fact m)
binomial.divides_fact_S : forall n : nat, divides (binomial.fact n) (binomial.fact (S n))
binomial.divides_n_fact_n : forall n : nat, 0 < n -> divides n (binomial.fact n)
Nat.lt_irrefl : forall x : nat, ~ x < x
binomial.divides_fact : forall n i : nat, 0 < i <= n -> divides i (binomial.fact n)
modS_divide : forall n p : nat, p mod S n = 0 < -> divides (S n) p
power_factor_lt_neq : forall p i j x y : nat, p <> 0 -> i < j -> ~ divides p x -> p ^ i * x <> p ^ j * y
gt_asym : forall n m : nat, n > m -> ~ m > n
Nat.lt_asymm : forall n m : nat, n < m -> ~ m < n
prime_bool_rec_spec : forall n p : nat, n <= p -> prime_bool_rec n p = true < -> (forall k : nat, 3 <= n - 2 * k -> ~ divides (n - 2 * k) p)
Nat.ltb_nlt : forall x y : nat, (x <? y) = false < -> ~ x < y
Nat.compare_nlt_iff : forall x y : nat, (x ?= y) <> Lt < -> ~ x < y
Znat.Nat2Z.inj_succ : forall n : nat, BinInt.Z.of_nat (S n) = BinInt.Z.succ (BinInt.Z.of_nat n)
Nat.compare_le_iff : forall n m : nat, (n ?= m) <> Gt < -> n <= m
Nat.compare_lt_iff : forall n m : nat, (n ?= m) = Lt < -> n < m
Nat.ltb_lt : forall n m : nat, (n <? m) = true < -> n < m
Znat.Nat2Z.is_nonneg : forall n : nat, BinInt.Z.le BinNums.Z0 (BinInt.Z.of_nat n)
n_SSn : forall n : nat, n <> S (S n)
BinInt.Z.mul_nonneg_nonneg : forall n m : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.le BinNums.Z0 n -> BinInt.Z.le BinNums.Z0 m -> BinInt.Z.le BinNums.Z0 (BinInt.Z.mul n m)
str_prime : forall (p : primestream) (n : nat), prime (p n)
Nat.mul_sub_distr_r : forall n m p : nat, (n - m) * p = n * p - m * p
Nat.mul_add_distr_r : forall n m p : nat, (n + m) * p = n * p + m * p
succ_plus_discr : forall n m : nat, n <> S (m + n)
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, pos (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, pos n -> pos (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
divides_trans : forall x y z : nat, divides x y -> divides y z -> divides x z
Fin.eqb = fix eqb (m n : nat) (p : pos m) (q : pos n) {struct p} : bool := match p with | @Fin.F1 m' => match q with | @Fin.F1 n' => m' =? n' | pos_nxt _ => false end | @Fin.FS n0 p' => match q with | pos0 => false | @Fin.FS n1 q' => eqb n0 n1 p' q' end end : forall m n : nat, pos m -> pos n -> bool Arguments Fin.eqb {m n}%nat_scope
Fin.t_rec : forall P : forall n : nat, pos n -> Set, (forall n : nat, P (S n) pos0) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : pos n), P n t -> P (S n) (pos_nxt t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : pos n), P n t
divides_minus : forall p q1 q2 : nat, divides p q1 -> divides p q2 -> divides p (q1 - q2)

```coq
intros H. unfold not. intros Hd. apply Hd. apply primestream_divides. intros k. destruct H as [p Hp]. exists p. rewrite Hp. rewrite Znat.Nat2Z.inj_mul. reflexivity.
Qed.```

original: intros H. unfold not. intros Hd. apply Hd. apply primestream_divides. intros k. destruct H as [p Hp]. exists p. rewrite Hp. rewrite Znat.Nat2Z.inj_mul. reflexivity.
